price: (Nkonyaayifoͻ no) kaa sε: “Mose, wo na wo (bεdi kan) atoͻ anaa yεn na (yɛnni kan) ntoͻ?”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ نَحۡنُ ٱلۡمُلۡقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna naḥnu al-mul'qīna
